sentences.english: The xylem of ferns only contains tracheids.
sentences.chinese: 蕨类植物的木质部只含有管胞。

sentences.english: The seed ferns included treelike forms.
sentences.chinese: 种子蕨类植物包括树状类型的植物。

sentences.english: North american fern with a blackish lustrous stipe.
sentences.chinese: 带有光亮叶柄的一种北美蕨类。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the ecological types of pteridophytes of Dulongjiang region.
sentences.chinese: 本文对独龙江地区蕨类植物的生态类型进行研究。

sentences.english: Tree ferns in Coromandel Forest Park, New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 树蕨类在科罗曼德尔森林公园，新西兰。

sentences.english: You can use leaves, pine needles, dead grass or dry bracken ferns.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用树叶，松针，死草或干蕨菜蕨类植物。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the fern medicine resources of Ailaoshan Mountain national nature reserve.
sentences.chinese: 报道哀牢山国家级自然保护区药用蕨类植物资源。

sentences.english: Pteridophytes in the Chishui Alsophila Natural Reserve.
sentences.chinese: 赤水桫椤自然保护区蕨类植物。

sentences.english: Acanthus Leaves, Wild Rose on Crimson Background, William, Morris.
sentences.chinese: 蕨类叶片，野玫瑰的深红背景，威廉，莫里斯。

sentences.english: I have some lavender, rosemary, and different ferns and mosses at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 我种了薰衣草，迷迭香，几种蕨类植物和苔藓。

sentences.english: Zhongtiao Mountain forest area has an abundance of medicinal pteridophytes.
sentences.chinese: 山西中条山林区药用蕨类植物丰富。

sentences.english: They can also provide basic information about the palynology and phylogeny of ferns.
sentences.chinese: 并为蕨类植物孢粉学和系统学研究提供基础资料。

sentences.english: This is the second report on the study of the Guizhou medicinal Pteridophytes.
sentences.chinese: 本文为贵州蕨类药用植物资源研究的第二报。

sentences.english: The fog nourishes plant communities from cactuses to ferns.
sentences.chinese: 这雾滋养植物群体从仙人掌到蕨类。

sentences.english: North American fern with narrow fronds on yellowish leafstalks.
sentences.chinese: 黄色叶柄处具有窄小复叶的北美蕨类。

sentences.english: North American fern with narrow fronds on yellowish leafstalks.
sentences.chinese: 带有光亮叶柄的一种北美蕨类。

definition: gymnosperm (plants with seed contained in a cone)
Euphorbiaceae (plant family including rubber and cassava)
